enviornments.name: node
enviornments.dockerFile:
FROM node
WORKDIR /usr/src/app
COPY package.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
{{ if .Port }}EXPOSE {{ .Port }}
{{end}}CMD ["node", "{{ .Main }}"]

enviornments.name: python
enviornments.dockerFile:
FROM python:3

WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY requirements.txt ./
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

COPY . .
{{ if .Port }}EXPOSE {{ .Port }}
{{end}}CMD [ "python", "./{{ .Main }}" ]

enviornments.name: Go
enviornments.dockerFile:
FROM golang:1.13

WORKDIR /go/src/app
COPY . .
{{ if .Port }}EXPOSE {{ .Port }}
{{end}}RUN go get -d -v ./...
RUN go install -v ./...

CMD ["app"]

enviornments.name: ruby
enviornments.dockerFile:
FROM ruby

# throw errors if Gemfile has been modified since Gemfile.lock
RUN bundle config --global frozen 1

WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY Gemfile Gemfile.lock ./
RUN bundle install

COPY . .
{{ if .Port }}EXPOSE {{ .Port }}
{{end}}
CMD ["./{{ .Main }}"]

enviornments.name: java
enviornments.dockerFile:
FROM openjdk:7
COPY . /usr/src/myapp
WORKDIR /usr/src/myapp
RUN javac {{ .MainExt }}
CMD ["java", "{{ .Main }}"]
